name: Kids Flurry Educational Puzzle Free Game
name_original: Kids Flurry Educational Puzzle Free Game
description: Kids Flurry Puzzle is an educational game that challenges children to use their logical thinking skills. The pieces are colorful and engaging, with each shape representing something different than what it looks like - for example one square might be in blue while another has green writing on it! The goal of this puzzle isn't just about putting together the picture; rather kids must find all nine animals hidden among five sets around four levels by asking themselves questions such as "Have I seen any birds?",
